scripts.postinstall: npx prisma generate --schema ./prisma-user-database/schema.prisma --no-engine && npx prisma generate --schema ./prisma-document-database/schema.prisma --no-engine
scripts.generate: npx prisma generate --schema ./prisma-user-database/schema.prisma --no-engine && npx prisma generate --schema ./prisma-document-database/schema.prisma --no-engine
scripts.deploy: npx prisma migrate deploy --schema ./prisma-user-database/schema.prisma && npx prisma migrate deploy --schema ./prisma-document-database/schema.prisma
scripts.studio: npx prisma studio --schema ./prisma-user-database/schema.prisma --port 5555 & npx prisma studio --schema ./prisma-document-database/schema.prisma --port 5556
